name: Phase Breaker
description:
Mouse to aim. Left-click to shoot laser. Right-click to shoot cannon.

Press the star to change themes.

Phase Breaker is under active development. I welcome your feedback in the comments or by email dev@fertilepixel.com

I am also releasing Phase Breaker to Android on the Play Store. If you want to join the alpha or beta testing group, please email dev@fertilepixel.com
